metadata.description: Community-shared AI agent skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: documentation-guidelines
plugins.description: Write or update backend feature documentation following DOCUMENTATION_GUIDELINES.md. Use for module docs, API contracts, and backend documentation with architecture, endpoints, payloads, Mermaid diagrams, and seeding instructions.

plugins.name: laravel-11-12-app-guidelines
plugins.description: Guidelines for Laravel 11/12 applications across common stacks (API-only or full-stack), including Docker Compose/Sail, Inertia + React, Livewire, Vue, Blade, Tailwind v4, Fortify, Wayfinder, PHPUnit, Pint, and Laravel Boost MCP tools.
